mapper.select: select doc_id,(case when length(doc_name)>300 then concat(left(doc_name,300),'...') else doc_name end) as doc_name1 ,(case when length(doc_name)>25 then concat(left(doc_name,25),'...') else doc_name end) as doc_name2 ,date(doc_time) as doc_time from t_oa_doc_main where doc_state='在用' and type_id=#{type_id} order by doc_time desc limit 5
